MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L25 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Manor Way, Malton Road, Manor Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 6:11PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:45PM on Tuesday 2nd March 2021
